page.title: 20A SCHOOL DAY (2)
page.content:
After playtime we come in and sit at our tables and sometimes do Spelling Workshop. For that you have cards and you memorise the words that are on them. After an hour or so we have dinner. Dinners are cooked at school and are good. At one o'clock we come in and do library change. Then we have the best part of the day, FOOTBALL! I am usually centre-forward. At the end of the day Mr Chivers reads us a story. We go home at 3.15pm.
The entries for this section of the Project were compiled by the children, staff and the friends of Charlton-on-Otmoor Parochial School, Oxfordshire 1985.
